archimate:DataObject.name: ConsequenceMetricNotification
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A communication that occurs as part of a MetricMeasureConsquence to inform about a MetricDefMeasureThresholdRule being crossed. A Notification is typically one-sided; in that no Response is expected. For example; a notification might be sent to a supervisor and another one to a technician as the result of a MetricDefMeasureThresholdRule fixing the limits of lost packets; being crossed. Each ConsequenceMetricNotification will include the value of the MetricMeasure and other information according to the scope of interest from the supervisor and the technician.
